result.title: Rationalisation of use of pesticides according to community ecology-based pest population dynamic estimates
result.description: Description: the knowledge gained on pest population dynamics when multiple different pest types experience uni- and/or bi-directional agonistic interactions will be used to reduce frequency of pesticide applications (notably fungicides owing to negative indirect interactions between herbivores and plant pathogens).
